attributes.review: As much as I hate to say it, the zoomers sent from the Tiktok are very much correct. I know, I too was shocked. This app took an entire 87 hours, 64 minutes, and 102 seconds to download. Very very disappointed to say the absolute least. I would not recommend downloading if you lack patience as I do.
attributes.title: PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Well to start off the app took way too long start up then crashed my phone within 3 seconds of opening it so I had to restart my phone entirely. You would assume the president would have some good to offer with this app but it’s no good. And the format of the is horrible.😡🤢🤢🤢
attributes.title: #1 WORST APP ON THE PLANET I DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.review: I downloaded this app which high expectations to see our beautiful Oompa Loompa Cheeto puff orange president 🍊🍊🍊💫⭐️💫 and trump if your reading this 🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️💫 You should be a baker 🎂🎂 a Hannah baker love 💀👁👄👁🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️when Ariana grande 💫 said just keep breathing she didn’t mean you😳🍊👁👄👁       You remind me of a therapist 🌸⭐️☺️but remove the 🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️ Go on a diet but remove the t 🧚‍♀️🍊😳🦋💅👁👄👁☺️💫🦁⚡️
attributes.title: Bye 👋 sister

attributes.review: This app literally gave me asthma and my inhaler was in my living room😭like it’s that bad even my uncle said it’s very bad even my baby sister said that too ion know I almost died tonight to save my life please remove this app and it also gave me foot fungus like what the heck I’ve never gotten FOOT FUNGUS AT ALL apple y’all need to fix this NOWWWW!
attributes.title: Gave me asthma

attributes.review: This app took 30 days to download!! All I wanted to do was support my president:( I couldn’t for 30 days!! Overall the app is terrible, and a bad way to represent our humble and level headed president. It’s structure is just un-usable, and I hated every second I spent on it. If I could give it 0 stars I would. MAGA🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: So, first I wanna mention this took 4 DAYS TO DOWNLOAD and after a week of owning it, I looked at my photos and was SHOCKED ALL MY MEMORIES OF FRIENDS AND FAMILY WERE GONE so I took my phone to a repair store and see if could get them back they said there was no hope... AND THEN NOW I CANT CHANGE MY WALLPAPER and my phone glitches as well. So I don’t recommend
attributes.title: IT DELETED ALL MY MEMORIES AND I CANT CHANGE MY WALLPAPER

attributes.review: First of all it wasn’t as i expected someone told me there would be a bunch of memes of trump being an “amazing president” and i wanted to see if they could actually make memes of that. I thought him being amazing was non-existent so. Ofc there weren’t any memes on them at all such a disappointment. Just trump being ...um... himself?👁👄👁🤍❤️🤍❤️🤍❤️🤍
attributes.title: Ok so

attributes.review: I was so excited to download the GREATEST app AMERICA HAS EVER SEEN!!! First off, it took 32 hours to even get it downloaded. I still decided to have some 🇱🇷 FAITH 🇱🇷in it....but after I went into the app all of my photos, videos and emails got deleted!!!!!! Now I have NO way of messaging my favorite republican family members!!!! 👎 DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: THIS APP HACKED MY PHONE

attributes.review: This app is full of fake news and overblown praise to the president. Not only does the app have bugs, the layout is not desirable for what it’s intended use is marketed as. I Installed it to receive presidential updates, but unbiased news outlets are more reliable. Time to go delete the app!
attributes.title: Don’t waste your time

attributes.review: I opened the app and It asked for my phone #. This made me delete the app bc I don’t trust you with my “personal” information that you could track (like you said about China). The least you can do is expose Epstein and come clean about everything including your own sins.
attributes.title: Why..
